snippet: Brown-Forman, the maker of Jack Daniel’s, Southern Comfort and Finlandia vodka, said its lineup of whiskeys led a 12 percent increase in third-quarter net income.
abstract: Brown-Forman, maker of Jack Daniel’s, Southern Comfort and Finlandia vodka, says its lineup of whiskeys led a 12 percent increase in third-quarter net income; reports profit of $177 million, or 82 cents a share, up from $157 million, or 73 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $1.08 billion.
lead_paragraph: Brown-Forman, the maker of Jack Daniel’s, Southern Comfort and Finlandia vodka, said its lineup of whiskeys led a 12 percent increase in third-quarter net income.

headline.main: Maker of Jack Daniel’s Reports a Broad Sales Gain
headline.print_headline: Maker of Jack Daniel’s Reports a Broad Sales Gain
